name: Snailog

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: The possessor is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

abilities.name: Herbivorous (Secret)
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Attack stat by 1 stage when hit by a Nature-type move.

description: Snailog are gentle and carefree Pok√©mon who love to spend their day on a cool grassy plain and enjoy their meals. They love to collect seeds and plant small trees on the wooden log they always carry. It can also serve as a soft cover to protect themselves.
